plot: Drama about jealousy, high finance and a mistress. Sanna, scorned by her lover Willi won't abandon him, but saves him from financial ruin. The swindling banker is brought to justice and Sanna reunites with Willi.
title: Wenn die Maske fällt
plot_es: Drama about jealousy, high finance and a mistress. Sanna, scorned by her lover Willi won't abandon him, but saves him from financial ruin. The swindling banker is brought to justice and Sanna reunites with Willi.
plot_en: Drama about jealousy, high finance and a mistress. Sanna, scorned by her lover Willi won't abandon him, but saves him from financial ruin. The swindling banker is brought to justice and Sanna reunites with Willi.
